name: Stampede
description: Launch across the earth and smash an enemy, dealing 1393 Physical Damage to them and all nearby enemies.  This attack is always a Critical Strike.  After reaching your target, you sunder the ground beneath you, dealing 503 Physical Damage to all enemies in the area every 1 second for 15 seconds.
effectLines: Increases the cost and the charge now deals damage in an area around the target, and leaves residual damage at the impact area.
coefDescription: Launch across the earth and smash an enemy, dealing $1 Physical Damage to them and all nearby enemies.  This attack is always a Critical Strike.  After reaching your target, you sunder the ground beneath you, dealing $2 Physical Damage to all enemies in the area every 1 second for 15 seconds.
